ComicInfo.Summary: It always comes down to this: At any moment, a zombie could leap out of the shadows and end your life. At last, it seems like there is a cause that unites mankind to end all our petty squabbles. But no. It's never that simple. Now Rick has a gun to his head.
ComicInfo.Title: Miles Behind Us, Pt. 6
